revised_title: An Experimental Study of Steam Enthalpy
tldr: This study presents an experimental investigation of the enthalpy of steam using a modified apparatus. The authors focused on overcoming various sources of error and improving the accuracy of measurements. The final measurements range from 10 to 225°C and are considered to be within 1 part in 1500 of the true values. The research contributes to the understanding of steam properties and the development of steam tables.
